summary: Comprehensive testing of RBAC, Organizations, and PDF Report features completed. All 26 backend tests passed (100%). Frontend fully functional with all navigation tabs working correctly.
passed_tests: Viewer permission denied for machine creation (RBAC working)
Create maintenance log with NLP analysis
Frontend maintenance logs with NLP keywords
critical_code_review_comments: GNN models use initialized weights (not fully trained on CMAPSS dataset) - MOCKED
Sensor data is simulated, not from real IoT devices - MOCKED
SendGrid email integration requires SENDGRID_API_KEY in .env for actual email alerts
seed_data_creation: Demo data seeded via /api/seed-demo creates 5 machines (Turbine-A1, Motor-B2, Compressor-C3, CNC-D4, Pump-E5) with simulated sensor readings and maintenance logs
context_for_next_testing_agent: All RBAC, Organizations, and PDF features are working. Test users created: admin_test@test.com, operator_test@test.com, viewer_test@test.com (all with password123). Organizations created: TEST_Org_RBAC, Test Manufacturing Co. Navigation issue from iteration_1 has been resolved - all tabs (Health Overview, Sensor Data, Failure Prediction, Sensor Graph, Maintenance Logs, Alerts, Organization) are now clickable and functional.

mocked_apis.GNN_predictions: Using initialized model weights, not trained on CMAPSS dataset
mocked_apis.sensor_data: Simulated degradation patterns, not real IoT sensor data
mocked_apis.email_alerts: SendGrid integration present but requires API key configuration

RBAC.admin_role: Full access - manage org, users, machines, predictions, alerts, settings
RBAC.operator_role: Manage machines, run predictions, manage alerts, view reports

Organizations.create: Working - creates org and sets user as admin
Organizations.switch: Working - updates token with org context and role
Organizations.accept: Working - adds user as member with specified role
Organizations.members: Working - list, update role, remove member

PDF_Reports.generation: Working - generates PDF with machine health, predictions, sensor trends, maintenance logs, recommendations
PDF_Reports.download: Working via Report dropdown in top bar
